p: Finally, we have focused on the possible Primitivo and Negroamaro wines classification in relation to four fault compounds, BA, ME, IA and AA, tested in two-component SIMCA models. Negroamaro wine samples with added fault compounds in three different concentrations (corresponding to permitted amount, alarm and defect content) were used to create the models along the Coomans plot axis. Almost all Apulian wines were all classified as non-containing fault compounds in concentrations higher than the maximum permitted amount, Figure 7.
